1.name: blink
1.description: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken from an enemy hero, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.

2.name: blades_of_attack
2.description: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

3.name: broadsword
3.description: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

4.name: chainmail
4.description: A medium weave of metal chains.

5.name: claymore
5.description: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

6.name: helm_of_iron_will
6.description: The helmet of a mighty warrior who fell in battle.

7.name: javelin
7.description: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

abilities.name: Pierce
abilities.description: Grants a chance to deal bonus damage.

8.name: mithril_hammer
8.description: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

9.name: platemail
9.description: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

10.name: quarterstaff
10.description: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

11.name: quelling_blade
11.description: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

abilities.name: Destroy Tree
abilities.description: Destroy a target tree.

abilities.name: Quell
abilities.description: Gives bonus attack damage against non-hero units, depending on the type of hero you are.

12.name: ring_of_protection
12.description: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

182.name: stout_shield
182.description: One man's wine barrel bottem is another man's shield.

abilities.name: Damage Block
abilities.description: Gives a chance to block damage, depending on the type of hero you are.

13.name: gauntlets
13.description: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

14.name: slippers
14.description: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

15.name: mantle
15.description: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

16.name: branches
16.description: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

17.name: belt_of_strength
17.description: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

18.name: boots_of_elves
18.description: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

19.name: robe
19.description: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

20.name: circlet
20.description: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

21.name: ogre_axe
21.description: You grow stronger just by holding it.

22.name: blade_of_alacrity
22.description: A long blade imbued with time magic.

23.name: staff_of_wizardry
23.description: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

24.name: ultimate_orb
24.description: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

25.name: gloves
25.description: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

26.name: lifesteal
26.description: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

abilities.name: Lifesteal
abilities.description: Gives lifesteal on attacks.

27.name: ring_of_regen
27.description: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

28.name: sobi_mask
28.description: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

abilities.name: True Sight
abilities.description: Gives the ability to see invisible units and wards. Drops on death.

31.name: cloak
31.description: A cloak made of magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

32.name: talisman_of_evasion
32.description: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

33.name: cheese
33.description: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

abilities.name: Restore
abilities.description: Instantly restores health and mana

34.name: magic_stick
34.description: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

abilities.name: Energy Charge
abilities.description: Gains charges (max 10) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area. When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.

36.name: magic_wand
36.description: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

abilities.name: Energy Charge
abilities.description: Gains charges (max 15) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area. When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.

37.name: ghost
37.description: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

abilities.name: Ghost Form
abilities.description: Enter ghost form, unable to attack or be attacked, but take 40% extra damage from spells. Using a Teleport Scroll dispels Ghost Form. Boots of Travel do not dispel Ghost Form.

38.name: clarity
38.description: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

abilities.name: Regenerate Mana
abilities.description: Restores mana over time. If the user is attacked, the effect is lost.

39.name: flask
39.description: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

abilities.name: Regenerate Health
abilities.description: Restores HP over time. If the user is attacked, the effect is lost.

abilities.name: Reveal
abilities.description: Reveals invisible heroes in a nearby area.

41.name: bottle
41.description: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

abilities.name: Regenerate
abilities.description: Restores HP and Mana over time. Effect is lost if unit is attacked. Empty Bottle refills near town fountain. You can also store runes in the bottle, to save for later use. After 2 minutes, stored Runes will be activated.

abilities.name: Place Ward
abilities.description: Places an Observer Ward to give sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 6 minutes.

abilities.name: Place Ward
abilities.description: Places an Sentry Ward to give True Sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 3 minutes.

44.name: tango
44.description: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Eat Tree
abilities.description: Consume a tree to restore HP over time. Comes with 3 charges.

45.name: courier
45.description: Losing the donkey is punishable by death.

abilities.name: Summon Animal Courier
abilities.description: Summons an Animal Courier to carry items for you. [CHECK DOTA TO MAKE SURE THIS IS CORRECT]

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Teleports you to within 525 range of a target friendly building. While channeling, gives 200 range vision on the target and pings your allies' minimaps. Teleporting to a non-fountain building takes additional time if any allies have also teleported within a 1100 radius of your target within 25 seconds.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. While channeling, gives 200 range vision on the target and pings your allies' minimaps. Teleporting to a non-fountain building takes additional time if any allies have also teleported within a 1100 radius of your target within 25 seconds.

attributes.Casting time: 3 (this value is not affected by the increase timer nor does it affect other allies' TP timers.)

50.name: phase_boots
50.description: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

abilities.name: Phase
abilities.description: Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. Phase is cancelled upon using another item or ability.

51.name: demon_edge
51.description: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

52.name: eagle
52.description: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

53.name: reaver
53.description: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

54.name: relic
54.description: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

55.name: hyperstone
55.description: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

56.name: ring_of_health
56.description: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

57.name: void_stone
57.description: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

58.name: mystic_staff
58.description: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

59.name: energy_booster
59.description: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

60.name: point_booster
60.description: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

61.name: vitality_booster
61.description: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

63.name: power_treads
63.description: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

abilities.name: Switch Attribute
abilities.description: Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility, and Intelligence

65.name: hand_of_midas
65.description: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

abilities.name: Transmute
abilities.description: Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5× experience. Cannot be used on Ancients.

67.name: oblivion_staff
67.description: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

69.name: pers
69.description: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

71.name: poor_mans_shield
71.description: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

abilities.name: Damage Block
abilities.description: Blocks physical attack damage, depending on the type of hero you are. Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a chance to block damage from creeps.

73.name: bracer
73.description: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

75.name: wraith_band
75.description: A circlet with fait whispers echoing about it.

77.name: null_talisman
77.description: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

79.name: mekansm
79.description: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

abilities.name: Mekansm Aura
abilities.description: Bonus HP Regen in an area. Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.

abilities.name: Restore
abilities.description: Heals 250 HP and gives +2 armor in an area.

81.name: vladmir
81.description: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

abilities.name: Vladmir's Aura
abilities.description: Grants a variety of bonuses to nearby allies. Lifesteal bonuses from Vladmir's Aura only affect melee units. Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.

84.name: flying_courier
84.description: Losing the donkey is punishable by death.

86.name: buckler
86.description: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

abilities.name: Armor Bonus
abilities.description: Gives +2 armor to all nearby allied units. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.

88.name: ring_of_basilius
88.description: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

abilities.name: Basilius Aura
abilities.description: Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 radius.

90.name: pipe
90.description: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

abilities.name: Barrier
abilities.description: Give nearby friendly unites a shield that blocks 400 magical damage.

92.name: urn_of_shadows
92.description: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

abilities.name: Soul Release
abilities.description: Heals HP over time for friendly units, but deals damage over time for enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected unit takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.

94.name: headdress
94.description: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

abilities.name: Regeneration Aura
abilities.description: Restores HP to allies in a 500 unit radius. Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.

96.name: sheepstick
96.description: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Destroys illusions.

98.name: orchid
98.description: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

abilities.name: Soul Burn
abilities.description: Silences target unit for 5 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30%.

100.name: cyclone
100.description: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.description: Target unit is swept up in a cyclone for 2.5 seconds, and is invulnerable.

102.name: force_staff
102.description: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

abilities.name: Force
abilities.description: Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. Double click to self-cast.

104.name: dagon
104.description: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

106.name: necronomicon
106.description: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

abilities.name: Demonic Summoning
abilities.description: Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you. Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level. Lasts 35 seconds.

108.name: ultimate_scepter
108.description: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

abilities.name: Ultimate Upgrade
abilities.description: Upgrades the ultimates of certain heroes.

110.name: refresher
110.description: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

abilities.name: Reset Cooldowns
abilities.description: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

112.name: assault
112.description: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

abilities.name: Assault Aura
abilities.description: Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units, and decreases armor for nearby enemies. Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.

114.name: heart
114.description: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

abilities.name: Health Regeneration
abilities.description: Restores a percentage of max health per second. This ability is disabled if damage is taken from an enemy Hero or Roshan within the last 4 seconds if your hero is melee or 6 seconds if your hero is ranged.

116.name: black_king_bar
116.description: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

abilities.name: Avatar
abilities.description: Grants magic immunity. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Some Ultimate abilities are able to disable through Black King Bar.

117.name: aegis
117.description: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description: Brings you to life with full health and mana 5 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 6 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears.

119.name: shivas_guard
119.description: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

abilities.name: Arctic Blast
abilities.description: Emits a freezing wave that does 200 damage to enemies and slows their movement by 40% for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Freezing Aura
abilities.description: Reduces attack speed on enemies. Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.

121.name: bloodstone
121.description: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

abilities.name: Bloodpact
abilities.description: Starts with 6 charges. Gains 1 charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge bestows 1 mana regeneration per second, reduces gold lost from death by 25, and reduces respawn time by 4 seconds. When the bearer dies, restores 400 HP + 30 HP per charge to allied units within 1675 range, then loses a third of its charges. While dead, the bearer continues to receive experience at the death location and gives 1800 unit vision there.

123.name: sphere
123.description: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

abilities.name: Spellblock
abilities.description: Blocks most targeted spells once every 20 seconds.

125.name: vanguard
125.description: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

abilities.name: Damage Block
abilities.description: Gives a chance to block damage, depending on the type of hero you are.

127.name: blade_mail
127.description: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

abilities.name: Damage Return
abilities.description: Returns any damage you take (after reduction) to the unit that dealt the damage. You still take the damage. Damage is returned as pure damage. Lasts for 4.5 seconds, costs 25 Mana, and has a 22 second cooldown. Blade mail cannot reflect damage taken from another suit of blade mail.

131.name: hood_of_defiance
131.description: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

133.name: rapier
133.description: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

135.name: monkey_king_bar
135.description: A powerful staff used by a master warrior

137.name: radiance
137.description: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Burn Damage
abilities.description: Deals damage per second in a 650 radius.

139.name: butterfly
139.description: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

141.name: greater_crit
141.description: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.

143.name: basher
143.description: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

abilities.name: Bash
abilities.description: Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.

145.name: bfury
145.description: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Deals a percent of attack damage in a 225 radius around the target. Does not work on ranged heroes. Cleave damage on non-primary targets is not reduced by armor values.

147.name: manta
147.description: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

abilities.name: Mirror Image (melee)
abilities.description: Creates 2 illusions of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee illusions deal 33% damage and take 350% damage.

abilities.name: Mirror Image (ranged)
abilities.description: Creates 2 illusions of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee illusions deal 28% damage and take 400% damage.

149.name: lesser_crit
149.description: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.

151.name: armlet
151.description: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

abilities.name: Unholy Strength
abilities.description: Gives +31 damage, +10 attack speed, and +25 strength while active, but drains 40 HP per second. You cannot die from the health loss when the bonus strength is gone, or the health drain per second.

152.name: invis_sword
152.description: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to break the invisibility, you gain 150 bonus damage on that attack. Lasts 12 seconds.

154.name: sange_and_yasha
154.description: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

abilities.name: Greater Maim
abilities.description: Gives a chance on attack to slow for 4 seconds.

156.name: satanic
156.description: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

158.name: mjollnir
158.description: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

abilities.name: Static Charge
abilities.description: Places a charged shield on a target unit.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits 8 targets, dealing damage. Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.

160.name: skadi
160.description: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

abilities.name: Cold Attack
abilities.description: Eye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers. On ranged heroes, Eye of Skadi can be combined with a lifesteal Unique Attack Modifier.

162.name: sange
162.description: Sange is an usually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

abilities.name: Lesser Maim
abilities.description: Gives a chance on attack to slow for 4 seconds.

164.name: helm_of_the_dominator
164.description: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

abilities.name: Dominate
abilities.description: Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit.

abilities.name: Lifesteal
abilities.description: Gives lifesteal on attacks.

166.name: maelstrom
166.description: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits 4 targets, dealing damage. Maelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.

168.name: desolator
168.description: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

abilities.name: Corruption
abilities.description: Your attacks reduce target's armor.

170.name: yasha
170.description: Yasha is regarded as thet swiftest weapon ever created.

172.name: mask_of_madness
172.description: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.description: Gives +100 attack speed and +30% movement speed but causes you to take extra 30% damage.

abilities.name: Lifesteal
abilities.description: Gives lifesteal on attacks.

174.name: diffusal_blade
174.description: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

abilities.name: Purge
abilities.description: Purges a target unit, removing buffs, slowing, and dealing damage if it is a summoned unit.

abilities.name: Feedback
abilities.description: Your attacks burn 20 mana (36 mana when upgraded) and deal the same amount in damage. Upgradable.

176.name: ethereal_blade
176.description: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

abilities.name: Ether Blast
abilities.description: Converts you and your target into ethereal form. Target unit is slowed and cannot attack or be attacked, and takes 2× your primary attribute + 75 as damage.

178.name: soul_ring
178.description: A ring that feeds on the souls of those around it.

abilities.name: Sacrifice
abilities.description: Consume 150 HP to temporarily gain 150 mana. Lasts 10 seconds.

180.name: arcane_boots
180.description: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

abilities.name: Replenish Mana
abilities.description: Restores mana in an area around the hero.

181.name: orb_of_venom
181.description: Imbues your weapon with the venom of a poisonous spider.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing, depending on whether your hero is melee or ranged.

185.name: ancient_janggo
185.description: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

abilities.name: Endurance
abilities.description: Gives bonus +10 attack speed and +10% movement speed to surrounding allies.

abilities.name: Swiftness Aura
abilities.description: Gives bonus attack and movement speed to surrounding allies.

187.name: medallion_of_courage
187.description: The bearer has no fear of combat.

abilities.name: Valor
abilities.description: Reduces the armor of you and your target. Lasts 7 seconds.

abilities.name: Smoke of Deceit
abilities.description: pon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisiblity and bonus movement speed for a brief time. Minimap icons will also be hidden. Upon moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, the invisibility and movement speed bonus is lost.

abilities.name: Magic Weakness
abilities.description: Emits a weakening blast that increases the magical damage enemies take. Lasts 20 seconds.

206.name: rod_of_atos
206.description: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

abilities.name: Cripple
abilities.description: Slows the target's movement speed.

208.name: abyssal_blade
208.description: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

abilities.name: Overwhelm
abilities.description: Stun a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. Goes through Magic Immunity.

210.name: heavens_halberd
210.description: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

abilities.name: Disarm
abilities.description: Disarms the target for 4.5 seconds. Lasts 3 on melee targets.

abilities.name: Lesser Maim
abilities.description: Gives a chance on attack to slow for 4 seconds.

212.name: ring_of_aquila
212.description: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

abilities.name: Aquila Aura
abilities.description: Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 radius.

214.name: tranquil_boots
214.description: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description: Restores 250 HP over 20 seconds for the wearer. If you take damage from a tower or another player, the heal is lost. The tooltip incorrectly states that Roshan will cancel the heal.

abilities.name: Fade
abilities.description: Fade to invisibility. If you move you will become visible.
